official_title: RXDX-105 for the Treatment of Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Harboring a RET Gene Fusion and a Patient With Ovarian Cancer Harboring a BRAF Gene Mutation
inclusion_criteria:
* This individual patient protocol includes treatment for 3 patients previously enrolled on IRB #15-270 (phase1/1b clinical trial RXDX-105-01):
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Any patients other than those described above are excluded.
